price: (Ummanni) Aad (Huudiin) sobsiifte. adabbiin kiyyaafi akeekkachiifni kiyyaas akkam ta’e ree?
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
